meanings.definition: The act of presenting something to an audience.
meanings.sent1: During the school assembly, the students watched a presentation about recycling.
meanings.sent2: The company's sales presentation was informative and engaging.
meanings.sent3: The magician's rabbit made a surprise appearance during the presentation.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a presentation of joy and gratitude.
meanings.sent5: The presentation of the award brought tears of happiness to her eyes.

meanings.definition: The manner or style in which something is presented.
meanings.sent1: His presentation of the facts was clear and easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The artist's unique presentation of colors captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The clown's presentation of the serious topic brought unexpected laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her presentation of the dish was like a work of art on a plate.
meanings.sent5: The presentation of the information was visually stunning and memorable.

meanings.definition: A formal introduction of someone to others.
meanings.sent1: The host made a warm presentation of the guest speaker.
meanings.sent2: The presentation of the new employee to the team was well-received.
meanings.sent3: The cat's presentation of the mouse to the family was met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent4: Her presentation of the royal family to the visitors was grand and respectful.
meanings.sent5: The presentation of the bride to the groom was a moment of pure joy and love.

meanings.definition: The act of giving or showing something to others.
meanings.sent1: The presentation of the evidence in court was crucial for the case.
meanings.sent2: The presentation of the new product to the clients was a success.
meanings.sent3: The dog's presentation of the ball to its owner was a sign of trust.
meanings.sent4: Her presentation of the idea was met with enthusiasm and support.
meanings.sent5: The presentation of the cake at the party was met with cheers and applause.
